com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync

Interface DataStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlocksData, DeathsData, ItemsData, PlayersData, PVEData, PVPData

    public interface DataStore
    Common interface for all data stores
    Author:
    bitWolfy

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  DataStore.DetailedData
      Represents data stored in a log format, i.e.
      static interface  DataStore.NormalData
      Represents the "totals" of statistical data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dump()
      Clears the data store of all locally stored data.
      java.util.List<DataStore.DetailedData> getDetailedData()
      Returns the static entries in the data store.
      java.util.List<DataStore.NormalData> getNormalData()
      Returns the dynamic entries in the data store.
      Asynchronous method; changes to the returned List will not affect the data store.
      void sync()
      Synchronizes the data from the data store to the database, then removes it from local storage
      If an entry was not synchronized, it will not be removed.

    • Method Detail

      • getNormalData

        java.util.List<DataStore.NormalData> getNormalData()
        Returns the dynamic entries in the data store.
        Asynchronous method; changes to the returned List will not affect the data store.
        Returns:
        Dynamic entries in the data store

      • getDetailedData

        java.util.List<DataStore.DetailedData> getDetailedData()
        Returns the static entries in the data store.
        Returns:
        Static entries in the data store

      • sync

        void sync()
        Synchronizes the data from the data store to the database, then removes it from local storage
        If an entry was not synchronized, it will not be removed.

      • dump

        void dump()
        Clears the data store of all locally stored data.
